About Me

My name is Ikhtiar Uddin Ahmmed Rabin.I am From Bangladesh.My home town is Narsingdi,Dhaka,Bangladesh. I had passed my SSC exam at Narayanpur Sarafat Ullah High School & HSC Exam at Abdul Kadir Mollah City College. Now,I am studying B.sc in Computer Science & Engineering at Daffodil International University. I am a web designer.I can freely work with HTML,CSS,Bootstrap,JavaScript.I can create eye catching Project. I love to coding.My dream in future i will be a good web designer & web developer.That's all.
